subject: Basketball
Coaches and Managers
Hiring and Promotion
lead_paragraph: In a dizzying 24-day stretch from late November to mid-December, six N.B.A. coaches were fired. All were represented by Lonnie Cooper’s agency.
snippet: In a dizzying 24-day stretch from late November to mid-December, six N.B.A. coaches were fired. All were represented by Lonnie Cooper’s agency.
